pr_title: minor: fix headers in various files not controlled by CI

timeline.bodyText: Can we remove content of this line at all, we do not need to update this file each year.
timeline.author: romani

replies.bodyText:
@romani do you want me to remove header from all Input files that don't need it? There are more if you look at diff from my update.
ae9edbd#diff-c04011f5de5dd3db31ac528406e0b465R3
replies.author: rnveach

timeline.bodyText: I think we can make this line empty too
timeline.author: romani

timeline.bodyText: Can you update command at https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/wiki/How-to-make-a-release#before-starting to find and "*.g" files also
timeline.author: romani

replies.bodyText:
To confirm, is this correct:
find . -type f \( -name *.java -o -name *.header -o -name *.g \) -exec sed -i  \
 "s/\/\/ Copyright (C) 2001-2015 the original author or authors./\/\/ Copyright (C) 2001-2016 the original author or authors./g" \
  {} +
replies.author: rnveach

replies.bodyText:
I think it make sense to move it .ci folder as script to ease operation by multiple maintainers.
current and previous year is easy to get by shell commands.
replies.author: romani

timeline.message: minor: fix headers in various files not controlled by CI
